mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_ID, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_STATUS, O.MEMBER_ID, O.RECIV_NAME, O.RECIV_ADDR, O.RECIV_PHONE, O.RECIV_REQ, O.DELIVERY_FEE, O.DELIVERY_ID, M.FILE_ROUTE FROM ORDERS O,MEDIA M WHERE O.MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND M.SUB_GROUP='대표이미지' AND O.PRODUCT_ID=M.GROUP_ID GROUP BY O.ORDER_ID, O.ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_STATUS, O.MEMBER_ID, O.RECIV_NAME, O.RECIV_ADDR, O.RECIV_PHONE, O.RECIV_REQ, O.DELIVERY_FEE, O.DELIVERY_ID, M.FILE_ROUTE
